description: Processes shipment data from CSV files and updates shipments via API calls with AWS4 authentication.

capabilities.name: la_shipment_update
capabilities.description: Creates or updates shipments by processing CSV data and making API calls. Reads delivery appointment details from CSV and sends updates to shipment API.

csv_path.description: Absolute path to the CSV file containing shipment data with columns: id, po, delApptDate, delApptTime, delApptNo

type_operation.description: Type of operation to perform: create or update

output_path.description: Absolute path to the output directory where results will be saved

config_path.description: Optional absolute path to config.json file containing AWS credentials and API configuration

author: Ali Imran
